name: Lion
description: The lion is a large felid species and a member of the genus Panthera.
etymology: The word 'lion' comes from the Latin word 'leo'.
history: Lions have been symbols of strength and courage in various cultures throughout history.

name: Rose
description: The rose is a woody perennial flowering plant with thorny stems.
etymology: The name 'rose' comes from the Latin word 'rosa'.
history: Roses have been cultivated for centuries and are often associated with love and beauty.
